introText:
In august 2014, I was flying my Phantom 2 quadcopter at Ardeche in Southern France, when a huge eagle decided to attack the quadcopter. Luckily both the eagle and the quadcopter survived :)

I have 'gamified' the incident...The eagle gets angrier(quicker) over time. Use the left/right arrow keys to rote and up/down keys to control throttle.
